body: So like, haven't been on avicus since yesterday, log in today and says I'm banned for 3 months. This is just BS. Any reason to actually ban me? Technically I was banned on "9/10/14" which is highly impossible, and this is just a total lie. I recently checked my infractions, and says that the mod "D00ZIE" banned me, unless you this server actually has a reason for banning me for like 2 months, that makes no sense what so ever. Banned for 3 months for Excessive Infractions? Yeah, no. And then this mod puts only a 3 day ban on the Infractions part of my profile? I have been banned about maybe a "week ago"(lol, if you get it) for Multiple Infractions, then you ban me again? This is just Bull. Goodbye.
